66911.summary: Some customers in the Westside & La Casa and Surrounding areas of West Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
66911.title: Oct 13 - West Kelowna (Westside & La Casa and Surrounding area) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
